title: Are we going to stop pretending Pantheon isn't a problem right now?
body:
He's been sitting at a 54-55% winrate now for the last several patches. This isn't an outlier, it's not just his "mains." He's sitting at 7% pickrate, which is moderately popular especially in top lane. He also doesn't really "fall off" until 40+ minutes. 

https://na.op.gg/champion/pantheon/statistics/top

Pantheon as a lane dominator used to have a very clear avenue to be defeated: outsustain his mana pool. Between corrupting potion, meditation mastery and thunderlords, Pantheon wins almost every top lane match-up with his mana costs not really being a problem anymore. Yes, there are some champions who beat him but that doesn't justify his ridiculous winrate and how effortless it is to stomp lane AND ROAM with a semi-global ultimate. This champion has needed to be reworked for a long time, his design is ancient and a product of a very different game where matches were won and lost based on counterpicks. League has obviously gotten away from that. There should be more to lane than eating autistic spear after autistic spear but that's literally all Pantheon does. 

As for nerfs, I would honestly suggest increasing the cooldown on his Q a bit and perhaps reducing execute crit passive damage on his E. I don't mind the idea of Pantheon being a lane bully but not to the extent that he is and not with the very little effort and interaction required to go about it. If he wants to bully, he needs to actually commit more than just spears. He needs to risk his tail and actually make use of his passive rather than the lane just be the following series of events: 

eat spears
have him passive block
 W/E 
Passive block
 Spear 
haha you're dead

And yes, I did just play against pantheon and yes I will admit a clear and obvious bias. I did not lose but I fucking hate this champion and he is one of the worst designed champions in the game. Laning against him is miserable, I don't care if he "falls off." Riot has gone away from champions who dominate lane like that for a reason, because people hate playing against that shit. It will be inevitable that somebody will throw out "haha just play champion x and make him cry." Okay and what about the thousands of other times he's used to counterpick you and 90% of the top lane roster? Furthermore, his statistics are simply too high right now. He needs nerfs plain and simple.

Pantheon doesn't really give you the chance to interact with him. He is guaranteed to hit his stuff on you while you can't trade back alot because of his blocks.

Illaoi and Darius are pretty strong lane bullies, too. But they allow counterplay. You can play around their kit, dodge stuff and all. It is possible to lane against them. You have to be extremely careful while doing so and try to dodge as much as you can. But it is possible.

Pantheon is clearly outdated and needs a complete VGU soon.

Sustain and falling off, not trying to _duel_ him in lane like 90% of people who go against him do.  But let's not forget...

Ganking him - since he's one of the most ridiculously vulnerable champs to a gank, in the entire freaking game.

Building early armor - since even a single cloth armor severely hampers his entire kit and everything he's supposed to do in lane.  yes, even building this on a carry. get cloth/chain 1st back.

Waiting it out/give up farm - don't try to do anything except farm til level 9, and give some up if u have to.  by then he's _useless_ if he doesn't have a single kill.  and better _by far_ to lose some farm than snowball him.

Waiting til he's oom - again, sustain helps here, cloth armor helps here, corrupting pot helps here.  Once he's oom, he cannot do jack shit to you.  you can all in him, farm at this point, push him out of lane, do whatever.    This should be common sense, but you'd be surprised how many idiots who don't understand this very simple concept.

Roaming - if you're really countered, and can't do anything, can't farm, etc. leave the damn lane.  nothing says u can't go gank mid, give the enemy jungler a hard time, tp bot, farm jungle camps for your gold, etc.  and giving up a turret but getting a double kill elsewhere is worth.  what a crazy concept

And most importantly... as one poster elsewhere in this thread mentioned, _stop fucking picking champs that are easily countered by him._  - Especially if you don't have a clue how to deal with him.  Right now the current top lane meta just so happens to be a bunch of champs that are countered by him (which is responsible for his current high win rate... gee, imagine that).
